mapper.sql: select id, yjrq, glbm, sbbh, yjllx, yjlx, shuliang, wfxw, cjsj, wsjsc, ztyc, zplyc, sjjz, sjjj, csyc, zfl, bz from dev_vio_equ_warning
mapper.select: select *, (a.dcsl+a.lsdcsl) dsh from (select t.yjrq, t.glbm, t.sbbh, t.sbmc, t.sblx, t.zpl, t.cszfl, t.dcsl, t.lsdcsl, round((ifnull(t.cszfl, 0) / (ifnull(t.zpl, 0) - ifnull(t.syl, 0))) * 100, 2) zfl from dev_in_use t where t.yjrq = #{yjrq} and t.glbm like concat('%', #{glbm}, '%') and t.zpl >= 10) a where a.zfl >= 20

select t.yjrq, t.glbm, t.sbbh, d.sblx, d.sbmc, d.zt, e.zt zt2 from dev_vio_equ_warning t left join dev_vio_equipment d on t.sbbh = d.sbbh left join (select zt,sbbh from dev_vio_equipment_daily where daily = #{preDate}) e on t.sbbh = e.sbbh where t.yjlx = '7' and d.zt != e.zt and t.yjrq = #{yjrq} and t.glbm = #{glbm}

select t.yjrq, t.glbm, t.sbbh, d.sbmc, d.sblx, sum(shuliang) shuliang from dev_vio_equ_warning t left join dev_vio_equipment d on t.sbbh = d.sbbh where t.yjlx = '1' and t.yjrq = #{yjrq} and t.glbm like concat('%', #{glbm}, '%') group by t.yjrq, t.glbm ,t.sbbh order by shuliang desc

select a.yjrq, a.glbm, a.sbbh, b.sbmc, a.shuliang, round(a.pjz,0) pjz, a.bz, a.result from ( SELECT target_day.sbbh sbbh, target_day.glbm glbm, target_day.yjrq yjrq, target_day.total_shuliang shuliang, comparison_avg.avg_shuliang pjz, CASE WHEN comparison_avg.avg_shuliang IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE CONCAT(FORMAT((target_day.total_shuliang - comparison_avg.avg_shuliang) / NULLIF(comparison_avg.avg_shuliang, 0) * 100, 2), '%') END AS bz, CASE WHEN comparison_avg.avg_shuliang IS NULL THEN '无足够数据进行比较' WHEN comparison_avg.avg_shuliang = 0 THEN '基准平均值为0无法比较' WHEN (target_day.total_shuliang - comparison_avg.avg_shuliang) / comparison_avg.avg_shuliang >= 0.5 THEN '数据激增' WHEN (target_day.total_shuliang - comparison_avg.avg_shuliang) / comparison_avg.avg_shuliang <= -0.5 THEN '数据巨减' ELSE '无明显变化' END AS result FROM (
SELECT sbbh, glbm, yjrq, total_shuliang FROM ( SELECT sbbh, glbm, yjrq, SUM(shuliang) AS total_shuliang FROM dev_vio_equ_warning WHERE yjlx = 1 GROUP BY sbbh, glbm, yjrq ) AS daily_aggregated_data WHERE yjrq = #{yjrq} ) AS target_day LEFT JOIN (
SELECT sbbh, glbm, CASE WHEN valid_count < 3 THEN valid_sum / NULLIF(valid_count, 0) ELSE (valid_sum - valid_max - valid_min) / NULLIF(valid_count - 2, 0) END AS avg_shuliang FROM ( SELECT sbbh, glbm, COUNT(total_shuliang) AS valid_count, SUM(total_shuliang) AS valid_sum, MAX(total_shuliang) AS valid_max, MIN(total_shuliang) AS valid_min FROM ( SELECT sbbh, glbm, yjrq, SUM(shuliang) AS total_shuliang FROM dev_vio_equ_warning WHERE yjlx = 1 GROUP BY sbbh, glbm, yjrq ) AS t WHERE total_shuliang > 0 AND yjrq >= #{preDate} AND yjrq <= #{endDate} GROUP BY sbbh, glbm ) AS pre_calculation ) AS comparison_avg ON target_day.sbbh = comparison_avg.sbbh ) a left join dev_vio_equipment b on a.sbbh = b.sbbh where a.result like '%数据激增%' and a.glbm like concat('%', #{glbm}, '%')

select a.yjrq, a.glbm, a.sbbh, b.sbmc, a.shuliang, round(a.pjz,0) pjz, a.bz, a.result from ( SELECT target_day.sbbh sbbh, target_day.glbm glbm, target_day.yjrq yjrq, target_day.total_shuliang shuliang, comparison_avg.avg_shuliang pjz, CASE WHEN comparison_avg.avg_shuliang IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE CONCAT(FORMAT((target_day.total_shuliang - comparison_avg.avg_shuliang) / NULLIF(comparison_avg.avg_shuliang, 0) * 100, 2), '%') END AS bz, CASE WHEN comparison_avg.avg_shuliang IS NULL THEN '无足够数据进行比较' WHEN comparison_avg.avg_shuliang = 0 THEN '基准平均值为0无法比较' WHEN (target_day.total_shuliang - comparison_avg.avg_shuliang) / comparison_avg.avg_shuliang >= 0.5 THEN '数据激增' WHEN (target_day.total_shuliang - comparison_avg.avg_shuliang) / comparison_avg.avg_shuliang <= -0.5 THEN '数据巨减' ELSE '无明显变化' END AS result FROM (
SELECT sbbh, glbm, yjrq, total_shuliang FROM ( SELECT sbbh, glbm, yjrq, SUM(shuliang) AS total_shuliang FROM dev_vio_equ_warning WHERE yjlx = 1 GROUP BY sbbh, glbm, yjrq ) AS daily_aggregated_data WHERE yjrq = #{yjrq} ) AS target_day LEFT JOIN (
SELECT sbbh, glbm, CASE WHEN valid_count < 3 THEN valid_sum / NULLIF(valid_count, 0) ELSE (valid_sum - valid_max - valid_min) / NULLIF(valid_count - 2, 0) END AS avg_shuliang FROM ( SELECT sbbh, glbm, COUNT(total_shuliang) AS valid_count, SUM(total_shuliang) AS valid_sum, MAX(total_shuliang) AS valid_max, MIN(total_shuliang) AS valid_min FROM ( SELECT sbbh, glbm, yjrq, SUM(shuliang) AS total_shuliang FROM dev_vio_equ_warning WHERE yjlx = 1 GROUP BY sbbh, glbm, yjrq ) AS t WHERE total_shuliang > 0 AND yjrq >= #{preDate} AND yjrq <= #{endDate} GROUP BY sbbh, glbm ) AS pre_calculation ) AS comparison_avg ON target_day.sbbh = comparison_avg.sbbh ) a left join dev_vio_equipment b on a.sbbh = b.sbbh where a.result like '%数据巨减%' and a.glbm like concat('%', #{glbm}, '%')
mapper.insert:
insert into dev_vio_equ_warning
yjrq, glbm, sbbh, yjllx, yjlx, shuliang, wfxw, cjsj, wsjsc, ztyc, zplyc, sjjz, sjjj, csyc, zfl, bz,
#{yjrq}, #{glbm}, #{sbbh}, #{yjllx}, #{yjlx}, #{shuliang}, #{wfxw}, #{cjsj}, #{wsjsc}, #{ztyc}, #{zplyc}, #{sjjz}, #{sjjj}, #{csyc}, #{zfl}, #{bz},
mapper.delete:
delete from dev_vio_equ_warning where id in
#{id}
